website_summaries.verdict: Powerful, dual-action polisher ideal for professional detailers.
pros: Ergonomic design with a multi-position handle
This polisher has a slow-start feature that improves control when first turning the machine on
cons: Best used with an extension cord

customer_reviews.title: Things to know about the polisher
customer_reviews.text: #1: The polisher does not come with a backing plate. You will need to order one. #2: It does come with tools and an extra set of brushes for the motor. #3: It uses a soft start feature so it will start slowly. This happens every time you let off the trigger. Even if just for a second, so you will need to expect this and re train yourself if you are a trigger puller.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Marty

customer_reviews.title: Fabtastic Polisher
customer_reviews.text: This Meguiar’s polisher is a great tool, offering variable speeds, dual action, soft start, and seemingly limitless reliability. Oh, one day in the far future I suppose it’ll need a set of new armature brushes, but thankfully it comes with those too. Otherwise it’ll probably be perfect almost forever.
customer_reviews.author: RoundelMike

customer_reviews.title: Stay away- Power cord issue.
customer_reviews.text: I used my MT300 about 4 times and it stopped working. I called the company and my unit is out of warranty so the repair is on me. Looks like my power cord is having issue and can no longer use the tool. Spend your money on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: hanriot

customer_reviews.title: 2 units failed in 2 different ways
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I use these for our business. In this particular case we were using it on two different sailboats, one 30’ and one 41’. The first one we ordered the motor burnt up 3/4 of the way through the first boat, they overnighted a new one which was awesome and then about 1/2 way through the second boat with the new unit the head with the wheel on it completely broke off and fell into the water. We had to dive and go get it, we ended up frankensteining the two units together to get the job done and then ended up sending both units back. I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx Lemos

customer_reviews.title: This was the best tool for cleaning my vehicles
customer_reviews.text: This was the best tool for cleaning my vehicles. It works just as easy as they say. Follow the directions to a super clean shine. My 2010 Tacoma had a dull roof. Could not figure out what it was. Tried cleaners that just didn't work or made it worse. Since I like a clean vehicle, I was upset. Instead of paying someone hundreds of dollars to correct the paint, Meguiar's did it for me. I have been a customer of Meguiars for over 30 years. My 2009 Chevy Malibu with some garage rash on the side from the previous owner. Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Mark N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice DA made my GG obsolete
customer_reviews.text: Powerful DA much better than my GG DA. More power, better balance, less fatigue after hours of use. Soft start up is a nice feature that you don't know you need until you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Tadd

customer_reviews.title: I love everything  Meguiar’s makes, but the MT300 has let us down.
customer_reviews.text: The MT300 works amazing! BUT out of no where in less than a year 10 months to be exact it just stopped working in the middle of a job!!!! I had to rely on elbow grease to finish the job. Buy the aftermarket warranty. I’m sending mine back to Meguiar’s so they can figure out what went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor Polisher
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Meguiare's MT300 Polisher on September 22-2020 and first time I used this polisher it worked well. I used it again this past weekend and all it does is vibrate and will not rotate. It also shuts off after ten minutes of use. After twenty minutes of cooling off it runs again for only ten minutes and shuts off. The vibration on this polisher is terrible. It will somewhat rotate if I lift it off the paint. Even just resting the machine on the vehicle without any pressure the polisher will not rotate, it just stops. It was very easy to use when it worked the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Rita H

customer_reviews.title: Love the ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: Love the ergonomics, soft start and thumb speed controller. I came from using a wheel and this was my first polisher. The design is much like a rotatory which was a big factor for me. Also I tried other major brands first and this was a very nice blend of rotary speed and power. I have only done a few cars with it so far so I can't talk about longevity but the design is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: dsddcd

customer_reviews.title: Great for legitimate detailers, but there are better option for the hobbiest
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials, wish the trigger was a speed adjuster but the new model has it. Big plus that it has a trigger lock so you dont need to hold the trigger down the whole time. Not to heavy. Wish the handle was adjustable other than with an allenkey. Wouldn't recommend for someone who only polishes/wax's their personal car. But the duribilitie and wide range of buffing speeds make it a great choice for detailers.
customer_reviews.author: James DIV

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: This helped get out a lot of those nasty water spots found here in Colorado. Paired it with the 5" foam discs from Meguiar's along with their compound.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: detail like a pro
customer_reviews.text: I detailed my car like a pro with this...Black Tahoe..left shiny and new..First cut with the red pad, then polish with the yellow pad, finally sealant with the black pad. Waited 2 hours and hand waxed with an applicator. Order an extra pad to wax after you use a sealant and your car will look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: aan ramirez

customer_reviews.title: It seems well built and is nice but I can't give more than 3 stars due ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid price of equipment but it vibrates so much that it translates to the user and will make your arm go to sleep. It seems well built and is nice but I can't give more than 3 stars due to the overall discomfort from vibration.
customer_reviews.author: BAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Best Orbital I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I have been detailing cars for several years and have used many different orbitals. Unfortunately since I worked for someone else, I did not have to much say in the orbitals that were used. Now that I am on my own, I do have a strong say, and I can confidently say this orbital is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Works great but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Love the var. speed. Only dislike: very heavy and pads can fall off once in a while. The first time I used it, it left a blister on my trigger finger because you have to grip it a bit hard and put pressure in trigger.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product but there seems to be a power cord issue
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Just had a power cord issue and am waiting on Meguiar's to repsond with my next steps. Most likely I will have to take it apart and figure out what is wrong since it was well out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool if you want to save money and care for your cars finish yourself. The adjustable RPM control is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen White

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice da polisher, something worthy of the meguiars name. But one thing is this machine is loud, very loud so wear some ear plugs and its a bit heavy on the vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This works like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been almost 30 years since I used a buffer to polish a car. This machine works great and I highly recommend it. As you can see from the pictures, the second one is after I polished it but before it was waxed. After I did my wife’s car I did mine as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stephens

customer_reviews.title: MT300 delivers
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I've been using this for over a year now and it's performed flawlessly. Combine it with some Meguiar's Microfiber pads and you'll be polishing and waxing with the best of them. I love to detail my car and this has cut down my time significantly. A+ for Meguair's
customer_reviews.author: SycsFinest

customer_reviews.title: Nice little polisher but loud and vibrates at high speed
customer_reviews.text: Nice little polisher but loud and vibrates at high speed. I'm going to use this polisher for waxing at low speed.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 1/5 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for about 2-3 months and then broke, not worth the high price for something that doesn't last that long. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bronson Sulser

customer_reviews.title: it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: this thing sucks. I used one before and it worked well but this one won’t even take out fine scratches or swirl marks. the backing plate is 100% garbage the pads don’t stay on they fly off on the car and risk scratching the paint by slamming the buffer into the car without a pad the velcro doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Head broke off after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted us 3 months and the head busted off. Very disappointed. Worth spending a little bit more for a rupes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Personal use
customer_reviews.text: This tool is pretty nice tool. I wpuld not recommend for production settong only personal use. It creates lots of heat which cause the pads to melt into backing. That is why I would not reccomend for a production setting. It is nice to have as a personall tool. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Shakes too much, gets over heated then turns off by itself, on the heavy side, burns through pads.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Marquez

customer_reviews.title: It sounds a bit noise in the gear housing, ...
customer_reviews.text: It sounds a bit noise in the gear housing, I hope this is normal, I will go back and look to see if there is any gear lube I may need to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: rocketman28

customer_reviews.title: good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: bought it on aug.. it just stopped working.. after a few visits to the forums it appears to be a known issue... intermittent contact... good when it worked..
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Solid polisher. Great gift for hard core gearhead.
customer_reviews.text: Great polisher for the price. You must buy backing plate. They come in 3 sizes. 5 inch is most common and would be the one to start with. You can get the micro fiber polish pads and polish combo from Amazon with the backing plate made by Maguiars. .
customer_reviews.author: H.K.

customer_reviews.title: Hand and arm saver!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use even for a novice. I waxed a Cadillac Escalade in 2 hours. Much less than it would have taken by hand. Applies the wax very evenly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: Cracked from 3 ft drop!
customer_reviews.text: Worked good while it lasted. I dropped it once and it cracked and stopped working. My rules. Porter cables, and even harbor freight polishers have dropped hundreds of times and have never cracked!!! Would becer purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, it really helps get the job done faster
customer_reviews.author: Chrix

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was bummed first time I used this because with the slightest pressure it stops turning. No need for the handlebar, works best one handed. Wondering if there's a better DA out there
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great polisher for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price. A little on the noisy side and it will stall pretty quick, but once you work with it a few times you'll learn how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the casual home auto detailer , powerful enough for professional results
customer_reviews.text: This DA polisher is awesome ! Because of the dual action it is nearly impossible to damage/burn paint. This system works especially well with Meguiar’s microfiber correction system. There is not much better of a combo out there regardless of price
customer_reviews.author: cord b

customer_reviews.title: Clacking & noisey but it does work...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 3 stars because it does perform however, it's noisey as hell. The orbital mechanism constantly fights with the gearing & you end up with the pinion & ring gear slapping the gear teeth back & forth. Yeah there's enough backlash between the two that'll constantly makes a clacking noise to a greater or lesser degree.
customer_reviews.author: default

customer_reviews.title: Product not working
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after three time use!. Could you kindly replace this item as we are trying to return it with a return label from your end?
customer_reviews.author: Hannah H

customer_reviews.title: My Car Looks Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Having never waxed a car before I didn't know what to expect. The results with all the pads and polishes, were amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this polished
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this polished. Meguiars makes some great stuff. I have started to notice a common problem with the power cord but meguiars is usually good with their warranties.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Not for professional use
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and using this but rotation is not just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tony I.

customer_reviews.title: A solid detailing tool.
customer_reviews.text: A great tool for light to medium polishing. Ergonomic handles, solid motor. Along with the right pads, this polisher will give the user great paint care results.
customer_reviews.author: Skyebandit

customer_reviews.title: Great Step up from my orbital
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old orbital with this and what an upgrade. I love it. I was able to make my 2002 Camry look good as new. Really!
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Awsome DA polisher!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast and easy to use, instructions right on the handle. thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super light but heavy duty. Best buffer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: This DA did an awesome job right out of the box. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: The lawn guy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Worst product stopped working after a couple weeks And the person that I bought it from is not trying to help me out
customer_reviews.author: f1man

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished may not work
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was defective. It was a refurbished model.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: You will never pay to have your car detailed by someone else again.
customer_reviews.text: This device is fantastic. It saved me a ton of work and teamed up with some good polish and wax it took the swirls right out of the black paint on my car. The best part is that there is no learning curve or art to working this machine. My car looked fantastic the first time I used the device and I have never used it or anything like it before. I will never pay a detailer again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J.

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product in an affordable price range. Very easy to use. Ergonomic in your hands. Use it multiple times daily with no problems with over heating the electric motor and very little vibration in the hands. Great for the beginners and professional detailers
customer_reviews.author: Tony Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!
customer_reviews.text: It was for my boyfriend's birthday gift. And he is just a fan of having his car clean not a professional. And this tool make car polishing easy, fun with a professional look.
customer_reviews.author: Hortensia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. It's really use full and the deliver time was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: José Fernández

customer_reviews.title: Awesome polisher! Saved me a lot of time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome polisher! Saved me a lot of time and pain. To bad it didn't come with a backing plate, but still a great polisher.
customer_reviews.author: jjjcool

customer_reviews.title: Good quality .
customer_reviews.text: This polisher is a good item. It is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Hands On Guy

customer_reviews.title: I've been detailing for years and this is the best buffer I have used yet
customer_reviews.text: I've been detailing for years and this is the best buffer I have used yet. Way better then porter cable by far. Did to car's today.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine lighter then others I have used, yet still powerful and gentle
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like using this, It does the job like a pro
customer_reviews.author: shawn  wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and it's easy to use for a non professional detailer person
customer_reviews.author: Raul Avalos

customer_reviews.title: i love Meguiar's, however I returned mine
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product a long time ago, i love Meguiar's, however I returned mine. Somehow it was ordered on accident and I want to just say it so far has been a hassle free return. I probably would have kept it, but didn't really have the extra money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: while slightly more comfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: My old one from two year ago died. Used it monthly to polish and wax my black 300C. It rocked! This one, while slightly more comfortable to hold, occasionally bumps the surface being waxed because of the bend in the handle. Plus the "new" thinner pads suck. They soak up wax and are basically trash after a couple of uses. The old larger pads were much much better, giving me monthly usage for almost two years out of each pad (ylw, mrn, and blk). The best thing about this is the locking trigger button. Get the older model, it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Noble16612

customer_reviews.title: It's still alot of work but results are much better than by hand
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. You can buff until doomsday by hand & never get rid a scratches & swirl marks. With this they come right out. It's still alot of work but results are much better than by hand. I never used one before but it only took 1 car to get used to it. Make sure you know how to release the lock before you use it, I accidently locked it & didn't know how to release it & the wax went everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Glad I opted for this polisher
customer_reviews.text: This thing is excellent. Only trouble I had was with the DMFC 5 cutting pads, which won't stay on. DA itself tho works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Tankcommander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Vibrates a bit in your hand. But does the job. Not quiet. But works
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Car show results for less!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Perfect for the beginner or the professional. Amazing results! No need to spend twice as much! Highly recommend! Great customer service at Meguiar's as well!
customer_reviews.author: rottiguy76

customer_reviews.title: hands down its probably the best polisher out there
customer_reviews.text: Does the job effortlessly and flawlessly....hands down its probably the best polisher out there...
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: So shaky and vibratory that you can't keep holding it in your hands for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy if you're in the market for it. I can't say never, but I probably won't ever take my vehicles to get detailed again. I adjust the speed to all recommended settings for what I'm doing. This rocks. Takes me half an hour to do my RAM 1500 crew cab. And since it's not being used commercially, I expect this to last a lifetime since it is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: ISRAEL

customer_reviews.title: The first one I purchased had a short in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased had a short in the cord. I exchanged it for another one and 6 months later the motor burned up. I have several other duel action polishers that I have used for years without any issues. Trust me you do not want to buy this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lively

customer_reviews.title: Nice amateur-detalier DA machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice amateur-detalier DA machine. Good quality. The handle is nice to have and you can adjust its position. Has a useful slow start to make sure you don't splatter everywhere. Comes with two spare brushes to change them up when you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Vargas Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is really loud. Need to use ear plugs. Perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm just a newbie but I didn't know I was supposed to purchase other items in order to use this polisher. Frankly, I have no idea what I'm supposed to get and this unit is very expensive. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: Trish Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Made my 3 coat waxing job very easy.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Made my 3 coat waxing job very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Yikes

customer_reviews.title: Way too Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular polisher, but it is WAY TOO expensive. You can get a very similar polisher from Harbor Freight for $40-$50 and it is every bit as good. Even if the one from Harbor Freight doesn't last as long... I can buy 5 of them for the price of this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the volt are to low i have to buy a inverter to run it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but it performs really well. My only concern is the power cord quality seems really cheap for a product this expensive. Compred to the other DAs it seems to be the most powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Mani Mani

product_meta.title: Meguiar's MT300 Dual Action Variable Speed Polisher
product_meta.description: Meguiar's MT300 Professionl Dual Action Polisher is precision-machined with Digital Torque Management and adjustable speed settings, and has been ergonomically designed to reduce user fatigue. It is engineered to deliver the best results when compounding, polishing or waxing your car. When you think quality car polish, think Meguiar's. Weighs 5.4 pounds and is designed for use with DBP3, DBP5 and DBP6 backing plates for 3", 5" and 6" discs.
feature_bullets: ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Perfect combination of form and function while Multi-Position D-handle Improves comfort & control for all skill levels
SOFT START: Provides easy control when turning on machine
BILLET COUNTER WEIGHT: Ensures smooth, precision balance with increased durability
DIGITAL TORQUE MANAGEMENT: Electronically adjusts torque needed to maintain loaded speed level
UNIVERSAL THROW: Great for compounding, polishing and waxing painted surfaces
Thumb adjustable speed dial - Wide 3000 - 7500 (Orbits Per Minute) speed range allows for faster compound and superior final polishing

specifications.Cover Included: Auto Parts, Automotive Accessories, Replacement, Performance Parts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
